quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因"mat"（垫子）的形近联想，或对"hazmat"（危险材料缩写）的字面拆分，将"hazmat suit"误解为与"垫子"或"危险材料本身"相关的服装
quiz_item.sentence: When the firefighters entered the chemical plant after the explosion, they were all wearing **hazmat suits** to protect themselves from toxic fumes.

option.definition: 防化服；危险品处理防护服
